plot: Based upon the seminal Urdu play of 1922. It recounts the love story between Prince Salim (Singh), Akbar's son, and the slave girl Anarkali (Seeta). Anarkali is walled up for her love for the emperor's son.
title: Loves of a Moghul Prince
plot_es: Based upon the seminal Urdu play of 1922. It recounts the love story between Prince Salim (Singh), Akbar's son, and the slave girl Anarkali (Seeta). Anarkali is walled up for her love for the emperor's son.
